name: Broken Realities
description:
You play as *INSERT CHARACTER NAME BEFORE UPLOADING* and you travel through *INSERT WORLD NAME BEFORE UPLOADING*. Use the quantum crystals to switch worlds and save yourself. 

It was our first ever game jam, and even our first ever game. We have learnt a lot and look forward to your feedback! There are a lot of bugs though, so happy hunting for them! ;) 

xoxo
